text: Sir John Steell (1804 - 1891) was a Scottish sculptor born in Aberdeen, but moved to Edinburgh at an early age. A number of the public statues there are by him including the one of the Duke of Wellington outside Register House and that of Sir Walter Scott at the Scott Monument. Category:1804 births Category:1891 deaths Category:British sculptors Category:People from Aberdeen Category:Knights Bachelor
title: John Steell
